document.full_text: president barack obama sent condolences to the people of japan on friday and said the united states would provide any help its close ally needed after a massive earthquake and tsunami killed hundreds.
document.title: u.s. readies relief for quake-hit ally japan
lines_and_colors: president barack obama sent condolences to the people of japan on friday and said the united states would provide any help its close ally needed after a massive earthquake and tsunami killed hundreds.
